## ValueHandlerBase.findAvailableOption() method

Returns first found options or null

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findAvailableOption(text: string, exact?: boolean): NgSelectOption<TValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | <code>string</code> | Text of option that is being searched |
|  exact | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether return only option which is exact match |

<b>Returns:</b>

`NgSelectOption<TValue>`
